授業目的: This course aims to provide an insight into development of Japanese culture with emphasis on arts and traditions. We will begin with historical overview, look into theatrical art forms, as well as traditional visual art, and explore main religions and secular traditions in Japanese society. Readings, lectures and AV materials are supplemented with a field trip to Kyoto National Museum and a guest lecture on Japanese Buddhism.
到達目標: Students will acquire insight into Japanese cultural history and familiarize themselves with Japanese traditions, variety of art forms theatrical, visual, etc, as well as crafts.
授業方法:
This course will be offered in an on-demand format through Monday, October 11.

When the number of registered students is finalized and the classroom environment standards are met, the class will be held face-to-face.

If the standards are not met, the course will continue to be offered in an on-demand format for health and safety reasons.
